description: List job production plan duplication work items with pagination.
permissions: User must be authorized via the job production plan template relationship (delegated JobProductionPlan permissions).
validation_notes: processed-at must be an ISO 8601 timestamp when provided. job-production-plan-template-id must be a job production plan template ID when provided.

flags.name: --job-production-plan-template-id
flags.description: Filter by job production plan template ID
